articles.description: Penn State researchers analyzed Curiosity rover data to find that Mars could once have been teeming with flowing rivers: the bedrock of life.
articles.content:
Mars has long served as inspiration to many a science fiction writer in search of a home planet for their imagined extraterrestrials.
But could the terrestrial red planet ever have actually been hom… [+4547 chars]
